job_title: Oracle Database Developer with Weblogic Exp.
jd: From: priyanka, Stellent IT priyanka@stellentit.com Reply to: priyanka@stellentit.com Job Title: Oracle Database Developer with Weblogic Exp.Location: Merrifield, VAVISA: USC OR GC OR GCEADWork Environment: (Hybrid – 3 days onsite after 3-month orientation period)Term: Contract ***Due to the required clearance with our government client, only US Citizens, Green Card and Green Card EAD holders may be considered. Clearance requires that the candidates have resided in the US for the past five years. The selected candidate cannot have left the country for longer than 90 consecutive days and no more than 180 cumulative days*** Requirements:5+ years of Client-Server application development using Oracle 11g/12c/19c3+ years of WebLogic Administration skillsExtensive Client-Server application development experience using SQL and PL/SQLProficiency with Microsoft Office tools including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Visio.Excellent verbal and written communication skills with ability to document design and support needsExperience with Java, C++ and Apex development is a plus.Experience working in a virtualized environment is a plus.Help Desk or Customer Support experience is a plus.The candidate must be able to obtain a sensitive security clearance from the company.
